reviewText:
Intense Metal Drumming is as good as the previous version but even more very well done!
8 angle cameras , HD way better sound and many other features.,

I will say GK is my favorite music teacher he is very clear when he is explaining an exercise and there is no blah blah blah just blast blast blast

if you have the time and patience to practice I will recommend this DVD is worth every single penny, it's gonna improve your drumming for sure if you put time on this masterpiece

Quite simply, an incredible player, blast beats, double bass, speed exercises plus other innovative exercises, offers everything an aspiring extreme metal drummer needs, the advice he offers in the interview segments is also very inspiring,
Amazing instruction  DVD and I I received it very quickly
George is one of the best drummers ever, this dvd is high quality straight to the point. I'm a total beginner so i cant do much of it yet but i see myself learning plenty from this.
I am a hug fan of George. So getting this to complement Intense Metal Drumming 1 was a must.
Fun to watch and learn to play!
Kollias is the best drummer i've ever seen

Top quality from an awesome drummer.
Buy it if you are interested in extreme drumming.
George really upped the ante with this dvd. Its packed full of usefull workouts and some awesome footage of Nile material and his own material.
Must buy.
